charges.charge_description: Aiding, abetting &; assisted one another to knowingly &; intentionally possess w/intent to distribute approx. 1216 kilograms of marijuana. 21:841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(A), 18:2 Offense Date: 1/29/00. PENALTY: Not less than 10 yrs. nor more than life imprisonment w/o probation, parole or suspended sentence; a fine of up to $4 million, at least 5 yrs. SRT, a $100 special assessment, and community restitution up to the amount of any fine imposed by the court.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 135 months BOP, 5 yrs. Supervised Release Term, $100.00 special assessment

charges.charge_description: Knowingly, intentionally, and unlawfully possess with intent to distribute a controlled substance as defined in Schedule I of the Controlled Substances Act of 1970, to wit: 3,016 pounds of marijuana (approx. gross weight). 21:841(a)(1) [ 2:00-m -46 ]
